translations: v.告密；进行小偷小摸，扒窃

phrs.translation: 机械测井仪, 打小报告
金色飞贼, 来无影去无踪
偷扒羽毛, 金色飞贼的羽毛
获取这飞贼, 正在翻译, 获取该告密者
告密, 告密者, 机械测井仪

sentences.sentence: You little snitch! I'll never tell you anything again!
sentences.translation: 你这家伙就爱告密！以后我什么话都不跟你说了！

sentences.sentence: The second-best outcome came when all four decided not to snitch.
sentences.translation: 第二名的则是四名组员都决定不告密的那组。

sentences.sentence: The second-best outcome came when all four decided not to snitch.
sentences.translation: 第二名的则是四名组员都决定不告密的那组。
